department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
description: Detailed description of supply and delivery of qty 2 of SV-80 NABCO Containment Vessels
full_summary:
## Containment Vessels Tender Announcement

### Tender Details

* **Reference Number**: WS4213764173-Doc4254747946
* **Amendment Number**: 3
* **Solicitation Number**: WS4213764173
* **Publication Date**: October 11, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date**: October 26, 2023 02:00 PM EDST
* **Trade Agreements**: Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA), Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA), Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA) and others
* **Regions of Delivery**: British Columbia
* **Contracting Entity**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)

### Tender Background

The Department of National Defence requires the supply and delivery of two (2) containment vessels, known as SV-80 NABCO Containment Vessels, along with related material, data, and training services. The purpose of the requirement is to enhance flexibility in explosive storage locations and alleviate compatibility issues.

### Scope of Work

The successful bidder will deliver and install the containment vessels, including associated equipment and documentation. The bid will also include provision of manuals, instructional materials, and necessary approvals for use in Canada.

### Selection Criteria

The lowest priced bidder that meets the requirements will be selected.

### Contact Information

* Christine Cress (SPAC/PSPC)
christine.cress@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
Phone: Not available.
Fax: Not available.

### Access the Tender Documentation

The tender documentation can be accessed through this [link](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17695551?extsite=MTc2OTU1NTFfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==).  All inquiries should be directed to the contact person above.

Note: There is one Actual Fixed Price tender awarded to the said company (unison as defined below). All other interested firms will need to petition an IR deal and agree an Actual Fixed Price Deal.
